description:
Hexagon Defense is an arcade-style defense shooter game where you protect your hexagon from enemies.

Features:

- INNOVATIVE PLAYSTYLE 
Rotate the hexagon and shoot the enemies! Enjoy a wide variety of stages with different themes and difficulty.

- CUSTOMIZATION
Craft your own gameplay experience with 20+ items, buffs, and skins! You're the boss.

- SOUNDTRACK
We are proud to present the extremely addictive in-game soundtrack by WHXTX ASXAN.
name: Hexagon Defense
